text: Talking about favourite animals in this Chinese dialogue. Personally, I like cats (猫).小明：小红，你最喜欢什么动物？小红：最喜欢狗，你呢？小明：猫，我想养一只猫。小红：你可以养啊，你自己住吗？小明：是的，我自己住。你下午跟我一起去宠物店，可以吗？小红：好的！小明：Xiao Hong, what is your favourite animal?小红：I most like dogs, how about you?小明：Cats. I really want to raise a cat.小红：You can. Do you live alone?小明：Yes I live alone. Come to the pet store with me in the afternoon, ok?小红：Ok!1 – 小明最喜欢什么动物？a. 老虎b. 狮子c. 猫d. 狗2 – 小红最喜欢什么动物？a. 老虎b. 狗c. 猫d. 狮子1. c2. bReview frequently.Share with others.Return as often as you can.
